Title: dotnet: ASP.NET cookie prefix spoofing vulnerability
Description: A security feature bypass vulnerability exists in the way Microsoft ASP.NET Core parses encoded cookie names.The ASP.NET Core cookie parser decodes entire cookie strings which could allow a malicious attacker to set a second cookie with the name being percent encoded.The security update addresses the vulnerability by fixing the way the ASP.NET Core cookie parser handles encoded names., aka 'Microsoft ASP.NET Core Security Feature Bypass Vulnerability'.
DataSource.Name: GitHub Security Advisory Nuget

Title: Improper Handling of Exceptional Conditions in Newtonsoft.Json
DataSource.Name: GitHub Security Advisory Nuget

Title: .NET Core: information disclosure due to authentication information exposed in a redirect
Description: An information disclosure vulnerability exists in .NET Core when authentication information is inadvertently exposed in a redirect, aka ".NET Core Information Disclosure Vulnerability." This affects .NET Core 2.1, .NET Core 1.0, .NET Core 1.1, PowerShell Core 6.0.
DataSource.Name: GitHub Security Advisory Nuget

Title: dotnet: System.Text.Encodings.Web Remote Code Execution
Description: .NET Core Remote Code Execution Vulnerability This CVE ID is unique from CVE-2021-24112.
DataSource.Name: GitHub Security Advisory Nuget

Title: dotnet: timeouts for regular expressions are not enforced
Description: A denial of service vulnerability exists when .NET Framework and .NET Core improperly process RegEx strings, aka '.NET Framework and .NET Core Denial of Service Vulnerability'. This CVE ID is unique from CVE-2019-0980, CVE-2019-0981.
DataSource.Name: GitHub Security Advisory Nuget
